price: Nokorε sε, Yεbεyε deε εwͻ (asaase no) soͻ no (nyinaa) mfuturo, a wira anaa dua (biara) nnka wᴐ soͻ.
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَجَٰعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيۡهَا صَعِيدٗا جُرُزًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lajāʿilūna mā ʿalayhā ṣaʿīdan juruzan
